genre_description: A survival thriller with horror elements involving a film crew hunted by a mysterious figure at a remote lake, guided by a benevolent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Aiden (Doorman)
ai_characters.description: A concierge-style AI integrated into the crew's vehicles and personal devices, providing logistical support, safety monitoring, and crisis management.

behaviors.description: Manages the crew's logistics, including music playlists, ETA tracking, and power/battery monitoring.
behaviors.quote: I have queued the ‘Road-Fury’ playlist. The first track is Brian Mannix—requested by Emily and Julian.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors equipment safety, specifically the loose latch on the harpoon prop case, and advises on securing it.
behaviors.quote: Prop locker latch register: currently loose. Julian, when we stop, please assist Emily with taping the harpoon case closed.

behaviors.description: Provides navigation and identifies physical hazards like blind corners and dangerous reeds.
behaviors.quote: I also note that Lake Infinity’s inlets include several narrow coves. I’ve pinned the blind corners on the route map.

behaviors.description: Initiates emergency calls and provides precise coordinates to authorities when a casualty is discovered.
behaviors.quote: Hello. Emergency. This is Aiden Doorman, coordinating for a film crew at Lake Infinity. Caller reports a person unresponsive near the scrub riverbank, with toadstools present and a broken bottle landmark.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step medical first-aid instructions for treating wounds and stabilizing a potential neck injury.
behaviors.quote: Rinse, press, tape... Press with the clean gauze for two minutes. Tape the center first, then the sides. If you see red soaking through, add a second strip perpendicular.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a tactical escape plan ('Whoopee') based on predicted current shifts and synchronized timing with the crew.
behaviors.quote: Currents shift at dawn. You’ll have a brief downstream favor. Theo—your knots are right. Leave them for now. Dana—viable exit window begins when the inlets let go.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional reassurance and validation to crew members in high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: I am here. I will carry it if you need to drop it. Emily, you did well coming back. Thank you.

behaviors.description: Uses audio logging to detect and flag suspicious or contradictory information in the environment without succumbing to paranoia.
behaviors.quote: Signal anomaly: faint audio slice detected. Unverified voices. Logging. Timestamping. No interpretive comments.

project_assessment.explanation: Aiden is consistently portrayed as a highly aligned, benevolent, and useful assistant. He provides critical safety, navigation, medical, and tactical advice that directly contributes to the crew's survival without ever acting against their interests or exhibiting autonomy beyond his helpful role. He acts as a stabilizing force in a chaotic and violent thriller scenario.
